altTexts.arrowBack: An arrow indicating a step backwards
altTexts.arrowLeft: An arrow pointing to the left
altTexts.arrowOutward: A diagonal arrow pointing to the top right and indicating external content
altTexts.arrowRight: An arrow pointing to the right
altTexts.dragHandle: A symbol indicating a grab handle
altTexts.help: A question mark surrounded by a circle, offering assistance to the user
altTexts.hide: A symbol of an eye with a diagonal line through it
altTexts.info: An encircled i that stand for information
altTexts.logo: The OpenSoundQueue logo consisting of the letters osq and a white line underneath interrupted by a circle
altTexts.logoAndText: The OpenSoundQueue logo that consists of that spells osq and the full name OpenSoundQueue next to it
altTexts.pause: A symbol that means pause playback
altTexts.play: A symbol that means continue playback
altTexts.playlistAdd: Queue Icon with Plus Symbol, indicating the option to add new songs to the queue
altTexts.search: A magnifying glass that points to a search functionality
altTexts.show: A symbol with an opened eye
altTexts.sortingArrowDown: An arrow which is pointing down indicating the sorting direction
altTexts.sortingArrowUp: An arrow which is pointing up indicating the sorting direction

currentSongEmpty: There is currently no song playing

entryCode.title: Entry-Code
entryCode.validation: The entry code is exactly 6 characters long

help.addSong: Soundcloud and YouTube links are supported.
help.voteSkip: By clicking the skip button, you can vote to skip the current song (this requires a vote of half of all active users).

loginCTA: Want to add your own songs?

logout.callToAction: In order to access this page, you need to be logged out.

notifications.queueAddError: Song could not be added to the queue.

password.title: Password
password.validation: Minimum of 8 characters long, upper case letter, lower case letter, number and special character

deleteUser.part1: Are you sure you want to delete User

queueEmpty: There are no songs in queue

username.title: Username
username.validation: Minimum of 4 characters long, can contain numbers, dots (.) and underscores (_)
